section.heading: Transfer of officers and employees to and from city and state agencies

content.p:
ยง 1048-n. Transfer of officers and employees to and from city and
state agencies. Officers and employees of city and state agencies may be
transferred to the authority and officers and employees of the authority
may be transferred to appropriate city and state agencies without
examination and without loss of any civil service or retirement status
or rights. Transfers shall be in accordance with section seventy of the
civil service law or the rules of the civil service commission of the
city, as the case may be. No such transfer shall be made except with the
approval of the head of the agency involved or the director of the state
division of the budget or the director of the budget of the city, as the
case may be, and the chairman of the authority and in compliance with
the rules and regulations of the civil service commission of the city or
the state, as the case may be.
